name: Diamond Push-ups
setup: Start in push-up position with hands forming a diamond/triangle shape
Index fingers and thumbs touching to create diamond between hands
Body in straight line from head to heels
steps: Lower chest toward hands, keeping elbows close to body
Descend until chest nearly touches hands
Press through palms to return to starting position
Maintain diamond hand position throughout movement
cues: Keep elbows tucked close to ribs
Chest to hands, not hands to chest
safety: If wrists hurt, use push-up handles or fists. If too difficult, elevate hands on bench or do from knees.

prescriptionHints.notes: More challenging than standard push-ups due to triceps emphasis

joints.notes: Keep wrists neutral; use handles if needed. Elbows stay close to body.
